channel.title: Masks RPG Forum
channel.description: Since G+ was shut down, I haven't been able to find a forum where ppl talk about Masks RPG, post about their sessions, their custom moves and other stuff like that. Do any of you know if there's a forum where ppl talk about this game?

item.title: Masks RPG Forum
item.dc:creator: @Paul_T
item.description:
@Paul_T wrote:

Right on cue, we have a Masks game being advertised here:

Masks: Days of Shadows Past Gauntlet Calendar
For the first 72 hours please only sign up if you have a) joined the Gauntlet this year and b) haven’t yet played with me. Sessions are on Saturday mornings US Eastern in July. General RSVP opens 5/15 This is for the first of five sessions of Masks, a game of young superheroes trying to deal with their powers and relationships. In this world, things have gone wrong: villains in positions of power, zombies on the streets, alien invasion—we’ll make and tweak our world to decide what’s messed it …

I think you could get a lot of comments and discussion on the game here; this forum is very partial to PbtA games in general.

Read full topic

@Thiagolrj wrote:

Thanks for all the replies!

Seconding the Magpie Discord. There are people chatting Masks there everyday.

item.title: Masks RPG Forum
item.dc:creator: @Jesseabe
item.description:
@Jesseabe wrote:

The place where I see the most Masks talk is the PbtA subreddit, but honestly, there isn’t a ton there either. You could also try the Magpie Discord, which is pretty active, and has a Masks channel.

Read full topic
